SQL Injection Testing Techniques

This scanner implements OWASP WSTG-compliant testing methodologies for comprehensive SQL injection detection.

Error-based Detection

Injects malformed SQL syntax to trigger database errors, revealing information about the underlying database structure.

Boolean-based Blind

Uses true/false conditions to infer information based on application response differences.

Time-based Blind

Introduces controlled delays to detect injection points when other methods fail.

Union-based

Attempts to determine column counts and structure for potential data extraction.
